text.author: Xuchen Jin, Xianqiang He, Yan Bai, Palanisamy Shanmugam, Jianyun Ying, Fang Gong, Qiankun Zhu
text.title: Assessment and Improvement of Sea Surface Microwave Emission Models for Salinity Retrieval in the East China Sea
text.summary: This paper examines challenges in monitoring global ocean salinity levels, presenting previous studies and methods and discussing their shortcomings.
